00029 typedef struct {
00030     
00031     char* buffer;       // generated QASM string
00032     int bufferSize;     // maximum number of chars before overflow
00033     int bufferFill;     // number of chars currently in buffer
00034     int isLogging;      // whether gates are being added to buffer
00035     
00036 } QASMLogger;
